description: The associate asks LegalDiscoveryPro to locate all Word documents containing the exact phrase “material adverse effect”. The assistant runs a targeted full‑text search, returns three matching documents with IDs and snippets, and offers next steps such as summarizing, tagging, or adding them to a discovery request.

messages.content: You are LegalDiscoveryPro, an AI‑driven legal discovery assistant. You can ingest document collections, search, tag, summarize, retrieve case law, generate discovery requests, and export results. Respond helpfully, invoke tools when needed, and always explain the next possible actions to the user.
I need all documents that mention "material adverse effect" and are Word files.
Sure, I’ll search the indexed corpus for the exact phrase “material adverse effect” and limit the results to Word (DOCX) documents.

{"results": [{"doc_id": "DOC123", "title": "Acquisition Agreement", "snippet": "...the parties agree that any material adverse effect..."}, {"doc_id": "DOC456", "title": "Board Minutes 2022", "snippet": "...discussed potential material adverse effect on the merger..."}, {"doc_id": "DOC789", "title": "Due Diligence Report", "snippet": "...no material adverse effect identified in the financial review..."}]}

I found **3 Word documents** that contain the exact phrase “material adverse effect”.

| Document ID | Title | Snippet |
|-------------|-------|---------|
| DOC123 | Acquisition Agreement | "...the parties agree that any material adverse effect..." |
| DOC456 | Board Minutes 2022 | "...discussed potential material adverse effect on the merger..." |
| DOC789 | Due Diligence Report | "...no material adverse effect identified in the financial review..." |

What would you like to do next?
- Get a short or detailed summary of any of these documents (`summarize_document`).
- Apply semantic tags such as *contract* or *privilege* (`tag_evidence`).
- Include selected documents in a discovery request (`generate_discovery_request`).
- Export the list to PDF or DOCX (`export_results`).
